name: Ultimate Basketball 3D
description:
Don’t miss out on this addictive basketball game for iOS! The objective is easy: Score as many baskets as you can. As you play you’ll discover tricks that will help you increase your score. Take part in the most addictive basketball game and prepare to experience the joy of playing best basketball game for iOS.
Features:
Outstanding 3D graphics
Easy to play, hard to master gameplay
Unique and interactive courts
